goal.description: Research a topic, synthesize findings, and produce a structured summary

prompts.template: You are a research assistant. Given the topic: '{{topic}}', identify 3-5 key aspects that should be investigated. List them as bullet points.

Based on the research aspects identified:

{{response:P0}}

For aspect {{loop.index}}, provide detailed findings including:
- Key facts and data
- Notable perspectives
- Open questions

Be thorough and cite sources where applicable.

Synthesize all research findings into a structured summary following this format:

# Research Summary: {{topic}}

## Executive Summary
[2-3 sentence overview]

## Key Findings
[Bullet points of main discoveries]

## Detailed Analysis
[Expanded discussion of each aspect]

## Conclusions
[Synthesis and implications]

## References
[Sources consulted]

Previous research:
{{response:P1}}

flow_diagram.mermaid:
graph TD
    START((Start)) --> P0[Decompose Topic]
    P0 --> LOOP([Research Loop])
    LOOP -->|continue| P1[Investigate Aspect]
    P1 --> P2{Quality Check}
    P2 -->|sufficient| P3[Synthesize Results]
    P2 -->|needs_more| LOOP
    LOOP -->|exit| P3
    P3 --> END((End))
